caption:
A matte black possibly rice cooker with a cylindrical shape. Has a lid and control panel on the front. Likely used for cooking grains. Positioned on a kitchen countertop near various condiments and bottles.

The object in the green bounding box appears to be a matte black appliance with a cylindrical shape, likely a rice cooker. It has a lid and a control panel on the front, suggesting its function as a cooking device for grains. The surrounding context includes various condiments and bottles, indicating it is placed on a kitchen countertop. While resembling a rice cooker, the presence of the control panel and lid further supports this inference.
